SELECT member_seq.nextval FROM dual

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM MEMBER WHERE PHONE_NUM = #{phoneNum}

SELECT m.nickname, m.email, g.goods_name FROM GOODS g JOIN MEMBER m ON m.member_id = g.member_id WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
